trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when the first HTTP module in the web application references the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado quando o módulo HTTP do primeiro no aplicativo web faz referência a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The first access of the this property causes a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object to be created and initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro acesso da propriedade faz com que um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto a ser criados e inicializados da configuração.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: You can access the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in an event handler in order to examine or modify it.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o recém-criado <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto por meio da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade em um manipulador de eventos para examinar ou modificá-lo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified federation configuration object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o objeto de configuração de Federação especificado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the federation configuration object specified by `config`.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>o objeto de configuração de Federação especificado pela propriedade `config`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>
O objeto de configuração de Federação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> objeto contém as propriedades configuráveis para o módulo de autenticação do WS-Federation (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) e o módulo de autenticação de sessão (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) em um aplicativo web.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the federation configuration object that was initialized from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto de configuração de federação que foi inicializado no arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto contém as propriedades configuráveis para o módulo de autenticação do WS-Federation (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) e o módulo de autenticação de sessão (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) em um aplicativo web.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: To modify the configuration settings, you can set properties on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object that is referenced by this property, or you can provide an new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar as definições de configuração, você pode definir propriedades no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto referenciado por essa propriedade, ou você pode fornecer um novo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The federation configuration object that was initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de configuração de federação que foi inicializado de configuração.
